attributes.action: stop self harm from being such a taboo subject.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A few of my friends and I think that self harm is still to much of a taboo topic when it comes to education in schools and the general public. 
So, with our combined brain power, we managed to come up with the idea of a petition. Were hoping to get as many people to sign this petition as possible, agreeing that self-harm needs more awareness raised. Then, of course when sucessful, to personally hand into Gordon Brown [as new PM].
Hopefully this can be the starting point to get self-harm into P.S.H.E lessons at schools, educate more people and have programs and documentaries like 'The Cutting Club' aired more frequently. 

Were hoping this might help to get the message about self harm across to those unaware and educate the public.

So, PLEASE! if you agree with this, sign below. Thankyou. x 

1. Cait 
2. Misha
